text: Vasile Gherasim (January 27, 1950 â€“ 7 November 2020) was a Romanian politician. He was a Deputy from 2008 to 2012. He was also Mayor of Bucharest from 2000 to 2004. Gherasim died on 7 November 2020 in Bucharest from COVID-19 at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bucharest Category:Politicians from Bucharest
title: Vasile Gherasim
